snippet.description: * The World Rushes to Haiti After many logistical hurdles in the days immediately following the earthquake, international aid groups began arriving in Haiti over the weekend – ranging from search-and-rescue teams with large equipment for digging through the rubble to health organizations...

snippet.title: My Journey to Haiti
snippet.description: * My Journey to Haiti ...Menon is in Haiti to help with the global effort to provide medical care in the wake of the January 12 earthquake. Because communication outlets are limited, he has been sending updates to his mother via text message. She has been transcribing those messages...

snippet.title: The First Days in Haiti
snippet.description: * The First Days in Haiti The decision to travel to Haiti to assist with medical relief following the earthquake was at the same time easy and difficult.
